author: tschoening
msg: LOG4CXX-421: I tried to build on Windows with XE 4 and APR 1.5.0 and APR-Util 1.5.3 and fixed the following issues:
* expat.h.in doesn't seem to exist anymore in the downloadable distributions
* replacements in xmlparse.c don't seem to make sense and caused compiler issues on XE 4 because of invalid syntax
* some headers weren't included unless COMPILED_FROM_DSP was defined
* XE 4 needs to define HAVE_SQL_H for ODBC
* log4cxx.rc had a hard coded, old version number
* minor improvements in the build documentation
The build currently still doesn't work for XE 4, there are some linker issues left and a lot of warnings during the compilation about wrong DLL exports.
